participant_1.background:
I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants.
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!
I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time.
i make ask a year.
i am always early.

i get my nails done every saturday.
I love a good home-cooked meal, especially when it comes from my mom's kitchen.
i try to eat healthy or i do not eat at all.
I'm glad I made the decision to pursue my passion.

content.text: I am doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm excited for my date tonight!
That's great! I hope you have a good time.
Thanks! I also have a new Renaissance Faire outfit that I can't wait to share with him.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've never been to a Renaissance Faire before.
They're really fun! You should go sometime.
I will! I love going to historical events.
Me too! I'm also glad I made the decision to pursue my passion.
That's great! What is your passion?
I'm a musician. I love playing music and performing.
That's awesome! I love music too. I play the piano.
That's great! I play the guitar.
